original_text: All the officers and all the people were happy to give this money. They brought it to Jerusalem and they threw it into the box, until the box was full.
korean_text: 모든 방백들과 백성들이 기뻐하여 마치기까지 돈을 가져다가 궤에 던지니라

sentences.original_text: All the officers were happy to give this money
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 관리들은 이 돈을 기쁘게 드렸다

sentences.original_text: all the people were happy to give this money
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성들은 이 돈을 기쁘게 드렸다

sentences.original_text: they threw it into the box
